Class GraphicalFPSMeter

java.lang.Object
  tools.GraphicalFPSMeter

public class GraphicalFPSMeter
extends java.lang.Object

GraphicalFPSMeter Add an instance of this class to the screen, and the current FPS will be shown.

Author:
Johan
